summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Indicates the frame rate at which a DVD has been authored to play.

member.name: DVD_TIMECODE_FLAGS.DVD_TC_FLAG_25fps
member.summary: Disc is authored to play at 25 frames per second.

member.name: DVD_TIMECODE_FLAGS.DVD_TC_FLAG_30fps
member.summary: Disc is authored to play at 30 frames per second.

member.name: DVD_TIMECODE_FLAGS.DVD_TC_FLAG_DropFrame
member.summary: Disc is authored to play at 29.97 frames per second.

member.name: DVD_TIMECODE_FLAGS.DVD_TC_FLAG_Interpolated
member.summary: Value representing the DVD Navigator Filter filter's best estimate of the disc's frame rate.
